item.title: Why Democrats Can’t Stop Talking About Elon Musk
item.description: Many Republicans remain convinced that their colleagues’ opposition to DOGE’s cost-cutting efforts will backfire politically.

item.title: The U.S. Must Not Abandon Ukraine
item.description: Europe needs to understand how high the stakes are, but so does the administration.

item.title: Does Moscow Think Vance’s Threat Is Credible?
item.description: Certainly, the prospect of U.S. deployments to Ukraine amid a shooting war with Russia ups the ante.

item.title: The Art of the Manufactured Crisis
item.description: This week, the hysteria revolves around Trump’s clash with the courts.

item.title: The Government Is Shooting at the Wrong Vaping Target
